metadata.description: Collaborative Intelligence Extensions - Cognitive extensions that enhance human capability, not replace it.

plugins.name: arch-guild
plugins.description: Architectural reasoning with The Guild. 13 specialized agents with orthogonal perspectives for multi-viewpoint architecture review.

plugins.name: core-ci
plugins.description: Core collaborative intelligence patterns. Use when: making decisions, verifying claims, avoiding self-deception, applying first principles, building with transparency and control.

plugins.name: build-evals
plugins.description: Eval methodology for AI systems. Use when: writing evals for agents, skills, MCP servers, prompts, or measuring AI behavior.

plugins.name: plugin-scaffolds
plugins.description: CI methodology for building cognitive extensions. Composes with plugin-dev. Use when: creating extensions that enhance human capability, applying transparency/control patterns.

plugins.name: experience
plugins.description: Experience design with non-conformist agents. Artist, architect, designer, labcoat. Helps users find their own direction, not prescribe templates.
